column5: Does anyone have any knowledge of Joyce Lake in Ontario?  It's a flyout from Red Lake not far from Trout Lake.
i have no idea, but welcome to the board...
It's a good lake with plenty of walleyes and pike.  It's C & R except for a few to eat while in camp.

Letpikego, welcome to our board.  You may want to introduce yourself as people 'round these parts are a little more friendly and helpful once we know a little about you.  If you do go up there be sure to post a report with pics, we love that here as well.  Welcome!
I appreciate the welcomes.  My 12 year old son and I are going to Joyce Lake early July.  I hope to have lots of nice pics to post.
